definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: The roof of bicycle parking lot in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 深圳的一處自行車棚棚頂。

sentences.english: When it rained, water dripped from the ceiling.
The Sistine Chapel ceiling painted by Michelangelo.
sentences.chinese: 西斯廷教堂的棚頂的繪畫由米開朗基羅繪製。

sentences.english: The covering was made of a long, tough grass.
sentences.chinese: 棚頂覆蓋着又長又硬的草。

sentences.english: Can be mounted on the car directly or any other temporary occasion.
sentences.chinese: 可以直接安裝在汽車棚頂上使用。
